title: Ex-MEGADETH Guitarist KIKO LOUREIRO Starts Off Tour With Performance Of "Tornado Of Souls" With MARTY FRIEDMAN
description: Brazilian fans got a treat last night from ex-Megadeth guitarists. The post Ex-MEGADETH Guitarist KIKO LOUREIRO Starts Off Tour With Performance Of "Tornado Of Souls" With MARTY FRIEDMAN appeared first on Metal Injection.
author: Isabella Ambrosio
byline: By Isabella Ambrosio Published 3 hours ago
excerpt: Brazilian fans got a treat last night from ex-Megadeth guitarists.
text: When Kiko Loureiro first announced his departure from Megadeth back in 2023, he told Guitar World that, he had "mentioned to management and Dave [Mustaine] that [he] thought bringing back Marty Friedman back would be amazing." So, when Megadeth decided to go with Teemu Mäntysaari as their guitarist, it should come as no surprise that Kiko Loureiro invited Marty Friedman to be a part of his upcoming Latin American tour. Last night (Friday, 30th May) at Santo Rock Bar in Santo André, Loureiro kicked off his Theory of Mind tour which proudly features Marty Friedman. The tour spans nine dates, Loureiro is running a 21-song setlist that features Friedman in the last five songs – you can check out the full setlist below. Blindfolded Reflective Overflow Pau De Arara No Gravity Carry On/Spread Your Fire/Nova Era /Morning Star/Evil Warning/Speed – Angra medley Conquer Or Die – Megadeth Killing Time – Megadeth Dystopia – Megadeth Jam Mindrise Dilemma Nothing To Say – Angra (feat. Alírio Netto) Angels And Demons – Angra (feat. Alírio Netto) Late Redemption / Heaven And Hell – Angra (feat. Alírio Netto) Hyperdoom – (feat. Marty Friedman) Tornado Of Souls  – Megadeth (feat. Marty Friedman) Asa Branca / Brasileirinho – Brazilian medley (feat. Marty Friedman) Tearful Confession – (feat. Marty Friedman) Rebirth – Angra (feat. Alírio Netto, Kiko Loureiro and Marty Friedman) Stormbringer – Deep Purple (ENCORE) Loureiro played several Megadeth songs before Friedman joined him for "Tornado of Souls" towards the end of the set. html:
When Kiko Loureiro first announced his departure from Megadeth back in 2023, he told Guitar World that, he had "mentioned to management and Dave [Mustaine] that [he] thought bringing back Marty Friedman back would be amazing."

So, when Megadeth decided to go with Teemu Mäntysaari as their guitarist, it should come as no surprise that Kiko Loureiro invited Marty Friedman to be a part of his upcoming Latin American tour.

Last night (Friday, 30th May) at Santo Rock Bar in Santo André, Loureiro kicked off his Theory of Mind tour which proudly features Marty Friedman.

The tour spans nine dates, Loureiro is running a 21-song setlist that features Friedman in the last five songs – you can check out the full setlist below.

  1. Blindfolded
  2. Reflective
  3. Overflow
  4. Pau De Arara
  5. No Gravity
  6. Carry On/Spread Your Fire/Nova Era /Morning Star/Evil Warning/Speed – Angra medley
  7. Conquer Or Die – Megadeth
  8. Killing Time – Megadeth
  9. Dystopia – Megadeth
  10. Jam
  11. Mindrise
  12. Dilemma
  13. Nothing To Say – Angra (feat. Alírio Netto)
  14. Angels And Demons – Angra (feat. Alírio Netto)
  15. Late Redemption / Heaven And Hell – Angra (feat. Alírio Netto)
  16. Hyperdoom – (feat. Marty Friedman)
  17. Tornado Of Souls  – Megadeth (feat. Marty Friedman)
  18. Asa Branca / Brasileirinho – Brazilian medley (feat. Marty Friedman)
  19. Tearful Confession – (feat. Marty Friedman)
  20. Rebirth – Angra (feat. Alírio Netto, Kiko Loureiro and Marty Friedman)
  21. Stormbringer – Deep Purple (ENCORE)

Loureiro played several Megadeth songs before Friedman joined him for "Tornado of Souls" towards the end of the set. You can check out the fan footage below.
